column6: THE EPILOGUE CHAPTER 3 When the Fantastic Four of the future meets the Fantastic Four of the present, all of Reed Richards' plans are laid bare. The final truth is revealed!
column8: | inker:Rick Magyar | writer:Dwayne McDuffie | artist:Paul Pelletier | colorist:Wil Quintana | penciller (cover):Michael Turner | letterer:Rus Wooton
